Html:
Below compiled fine until the new 0.9.1

var links = this.Top.lastElementChild.getElementsByTagName("a");
if (links.length > 0)
{
    var el = links[links.length-1];
The new 0.9.1 compiler infers "var el" to "Node" and not "HTMLAnchorElement"

This should be a bug right?
---bjorn
